

```{r}
library(spatstat)
#create a point pattern
pp_csr <- rpoispp(lambda = 50)

```


```{r}
plot(pp_csr)


den <- density(pp_csr, sigma = 0.1)
plot(den)
contour(den)

bw.diggle <- bw.diggle(pp_csr)
bw.diggle


```
